document_data.name: Ashtukzu I
document_data.mainbody: '''Ashtukzu I''', who was also called '''the Mulan''', was the first King of the [[Mulan Dynasty]] who ruled the city-state of [[Westgate]].
document_data.Activities: Ashtukzu was a [[mulan]] worshiper of [[Gilgeam]] who once lived in [[Unther]]. He was sent by the God-King to conquer and absorb the city-state of Westgate. He accomplished this in {{Yearlink|-27}} when he took the city and ousted the [[doppleganger]] posing as King [[Ryndarth Soleilon II]]. However, once he had established a firm grip on the city as King he declared Westgate to be independent of Unther.
document_data.Relationships: His nephew was [[Thunn]], who would later betray him and take the throne in {{Yearlink|-8}}.
